select product_name, product_price, productimg_image, productimg_no, p.product_no from categorylist c FULL OUTER JOIN product p on c.categorylist_no = p.categorylist_no FULL OUTER JOIN productimg i on p.product_no = i.product_no where productimg_image is not null and mall_no= #{mall_no } and product_state = 1 and productimg_flag = 0 and rownum <= 20 order by productimg_no desc
